requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS / Linux Mint 17
  • Processor: 1 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 100% OpenGL accelerated card or onboard graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any ALSA supported card on onboard audio
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS / Linux Mint 18
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 100% OpenGL accelerated card or onboard graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any ALSA supported card on onboard audio

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any 100% Open GL capable (Card on Onboard)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 3D graphics card or onboard graphics compatible with DirectX 9.0c
  • Additional Notes: 100% DirectX 9 compatible card or onboard sound
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any 100% OpenGL capable (Card or Onboard)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 3D graphics card or onboard graphics compatible with DirectX 9.0c
  • Additional Notes: 100% DirectX 9 compatible card or onboard sound
